message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $150.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. However, $150 is a bit high for me. I can find similar products for around $120 elsewhere. Would you be willing to sell it for $100? This would make it more attractive for me to buy from you.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. While I understand your position, I cannot go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway though. How about $125? This is a good deal considering the value of the product.
